quote: Success is a journey, not a destination. The doing is often more important than the outcome.
Persistence guarantees that results are inevitable.
The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
What seems impossible today will one day become your warm-up.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
You don’t need to be perfect, you just need to be better than yesterday.
The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.
Work as though everything depended on you, pray as though everything depended on God.
Success comes from having dreams that are bigger than your fears.
Success is achieved and maintained by those who try and keep trying.
Don’t wish for it; work for it.
A river cuts through rock not because of its power but because of its persistence.
The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
Fall seven times, stand up eight.
Consistency is key to achieving and maintaining momentum.
You can't have a million-dollar dream with a minimum-wage work ethic.
Success is never accidental.
To succeed, you have to be willing to fail.
If you can’t stop thinking about it, don’t stop working for it.
Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
Be stubborn about your goals and flexible about your methods.
The only difference between success and failure is the ability to take action.
The greatest pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do.
Success is a science; if you have the conditions, you get the result.
Success doesn't just find you. You have to go out and get it.
Success is dependent on effort.
If you really want to do something, you'll find a way. If you don't, you'll find an excuse.
Success is what happens after you have survived all your mistakes.
The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
Success is about creating value.
The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
Don’t wait for opportunities, create them.
The road to success is always under construction.
Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
Success comes from taking the initiative and following up.
Consistency breeds success.
Your goals don’t care about your excuses.
Success requires dedication, discipline, and hard work.
If you want to fly, you have to give up the things that weigh you down.
Success is best when it's shared.
Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
Focus on your goal. Don’t look in any direction but ahead.
Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself.
Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
Success isn’t about how much money you make, it’s about the difference you make in people’s lives.
The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
Do not be embarrassed by your failures, learn from them and start again.
The more you sweat in practice, the less you bleed in battle.
It always seems impossible until it’s done.
Without hustle, talent will only carry you so far.
The harder the battle, the sweeter the victory.
Success is the progressive realization of a worthy goal.
Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe.
Dream big, stay positive, work hard, and enjoy the journey.
Success is to wake up each morning and consciously decide that today will be the best day of your life.
Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
Don’t aspire to be the best on the team, aspire to be the best for the team.
Success is not about perfection, but consistency.
You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
Success is a state of mind. If you want success, start thinking of yourself as a success.
There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
Success is the by-product of your habits and consistency.
Success is 1% inspiration, 99% perspiration.
Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.
Success is simply a matter of hanging on when others have let go.
Success doesn’t come from what you do occasionally, it comes from what you do consistently.
Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
The price of success is hard work, dedication, and consistency.
